languages.text: {n}Плен явно не ослабил его физической мощи. Вы убеждаетесь в этом, когда опознаете в кучке падали у его ног останки друкари, вероятнее всего служившего гемункулу. Именно его плотью перекусывает ваш собеседник.{/n}

{n}It is clear that captivity has sapped this prisoner of none of his physical power. Your assessment is confirmed when you spot the remains of a Drukhari in the pile of carrion at his feet, likely one of the Haemonculus's servants. The Drukhari's flesh appears to be making a fine snack for your new acquaintance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Плен явно не ослабил его физической мощи. Вы убеждаетесь в этом, когда опознаете в кучке падали у его ног останки друкари, вероятнее всего служившего гемункулу. Именно его плотью перекусывает ваш собеседник.{/n}

languages.text: {n}很明显，囚禁在笼中的生活完全没有削弱这位囚犯的战斗能力。你看到，他脚下的腐肉堆中有一具黑暗灵族的残骸，看起来像是血伶人的仆从，这一幕进一步证实了你的猜想。那位黑暗灵族的血肉，如今已经成为了你这位新熟人的美餐。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is clear that captivity has sapped this prisoner of none of his physical power. Your assessment is confirmed when you spot the remains of a Drukhari in the pile of carrion at his feet, likely one of the Haemonculus's servants. The Drukhari's flesh appears to be making a fine snack for your new acquaintance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}很明显，囚禁在笼中的生活完全没有削弱这位囚犯的战斗能力。你看到，他脚下的腐肉堆中有一具黑暗灵族的残骸，看起来像是血伶人的仆从，这一幕进一步证实了你的猜想。那位黑暗灵族的血肉，如今已经成为了你这位新熟人的美餐。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}囚われの身となっても身体能力は一切失っていないようだ。足元に積まれた死骸の山から、おそらくハモンキュラスの従者のひとりであろうデュカーリの亡骸を見つけたとき、推測は確信に変わる。このデュカーリの肉は、どうやら目の前の新たな知り合いの良きつまみとなっているのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is clear that captivity has sapped this prisoner of none of his physical power. Your assessment is confirmed when you spot the remains of a Drukhari in the pile of carrion at his feet, likely one of the Haemonculus's servants. The Drukhari's flesh appears to be making a fine snack for your new acquaintance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}囚われの身となっても身体能力は一切失っていないようだ。足元に積まれた死骸の山から、おそらくハモンキュラスの従者のひとりであろうデュカーリの亡骸を見つけたとき、推測は確信に変わる。このデュカーリの肉は、どうやら目の前の新たな知り合いの良きつまみとなっているのだろう。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Está claro que el cautiverio no ha socavado el poderío físico de este prisionero. Confirmas tu hipótesis al ver los restos de un Drukhari entre la carroña que hay a sus pies. Probablemente fuera uno de los sirvientes del Hemónculo. La carne del Drukhari parece servir de aperitivo para tu nuevo conocido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is clear that captivity has sapped this prisoner of none of his physical power. Your assessment is confirmed when you spot the remains of a Drukhari in the pile of carrion at his feet, likely one of the Haemonculus's servants. The Drukhari's flesh appears to be making a fine snack for your new acquaintance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Está claro que el cautiverio no ha socavado el poderío físico de este prisionero. Confirmas tu hipótesis al ver los restos de un Drukhari entre la carroña que hay a sus pies. Probablemente fuera uno de los sirvientes del Hemónculo. La carne del Drukhari está sirviendo de aperitivo para tu nuevo conocido.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Visiblement, la captivité n'a en rien diminué la force physique de cet homme, ce que semble confirmer le cadavre d'un Drukhari, probablement un serviteur de l'hémoncule, qui gît sur un tas de charognes à ses pieds. C'est d'ailleurs sa chair qui sert présentement de casse-croûte à votre nouvelle connaissance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is clear that captivity has sapped this prisoner of none of his physical power. Your assessment is confirmed when you spot the remains of a Drukhari in the pile of carrion at his feet, likely one of the Haemonculus's servants. The Drukhari's flesh appears to be making a fine snack for your new acquaintance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Visiblement, la captivité n'a en rien diminué la force physique de cet homme, ce que semble confirmer le cadavre d'un Drukhari, probablement un serviteur de l'hémoncule, qui gît sur un tas de charognes à ses pieds. C'est d'ailleurs sa chair qui sert présentement de casse-croûte à votre nouvelle connaissance.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Die Gefangenschaft hatte bei diesem Häftling offensichtlich keinen Einfluss auf seine Körperkraft. Deine Einschätzung wird bestätigt, als du in dem Haufen von Leichenresten zu seinen Füßen auch einen Drukhari entdeckst, wahrscheinlich ein Diener des Haemonculus. Das Fleisch des Drukhari scheint für deine neue Bekanntschaft ein schmackhafter Snack zu sein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is clear that captivity has sapped this prisoner of none of his physical power. Your assessment is confirmed when you spot the remains of a Drukhari in the pile of carrion at his feet, likely one of the Haemonculus's servants. The Drukhari's flesh appears to be making a fine snack for your new acquaintance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Gefangenschaft hatte bei diesem Häftling offensichtlich keinen Einfluss auf seine Körperkraft. Deine Einschätzung wird bestätigt, als du in dem Haufen von Leichenresten zu seinen Füßen auch einen Drukhari entdeckst, wahrscheinlich ein Diener des Haemonculus. Sein Fleisch dient derzeit deiner neuen Bekanntschaft als schmackhafter Snack.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Tutsaklığın, bu mahkûmu fiziksel gücünden hiç de mahrum bırakmadığı çok açık. Ayaklarının dibindeki ceset yığınında muhtemelen Haimonkulus'un hizmetkârlarından birine ait olan Drukhari kalıntıları gördüğüne dair değerlendirmende haklı çıkıyorsun. Drukhari eti, görünüşe göre yeni tanıştığın adamın sevdiği bir atıştırmalık.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is clear that captivity has sapped this prisoner of none of his physical power. Your assessment is confirmed when you spot the remains of a Drukhari in the pile of carrion at his feet, likely one of the Haemonculus's servants. The Drukhari's flesh appears to be making a fine snack for your new acquaintance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tutsaklığın bu mahkûmu fiziksel gücünden hiç de mahrum bırakmadığı çok açık. Ayaklarının dibindeki ceset yığınında muhtemelen Haimonkulus'un hizmetkârlarından birine ait olan Drukhari kalıntıları gördüğüne dair değerlendirmende haklı çıktın. Drukhari eti, görünüşe göre yeni tanıştığın adam için lezzetli bir atıştırmalık.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
